#include<stdio.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(long long int &x)
{
    register long long int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
void matrix_multiply(long long a[2][2],long long b[2][2],long long prod[2][2]){
                prod[0][0]=(a[0][0]*b[0][0] + a[0][1]*b[1][0])%MOD;
                prod[0][1]=(a[0][0]*b[0][1] + a[0][1]*b[1][1])%MOD;
                prod[1][0]=(a[1][0]*b[0][0] + a[1][1]*b[1][0])%MOD;
                prod[1][1]=(a[1][0]*b[0][1] + a[1][1]*b[1][1])%MOD;
               }
void matrix_copy(long long source[2][2],long long dest[2][2]){
             dest[0][0]=source[0][0];
              dest[0][1]=source[0][1];
               dest[1][0]=source[1][0];
                dest[1][1]=source[1][1];
              }
void fib(long long power,long long ans[2][2])
              {
               long long b[2][2]={0},temp[2][2]={0};
               b[0][0]=1; b[0][1]=1;
               b[1][0]=1;
               ans[0][0]=1; ans[1][1]=1;
               while(power>0){
                              if(power&1){
                                matrix_multiply(ans,b,temp);
                                matrix_copy(temp,ans);
                                }
                                matrix_multiply(b,b,temp);
                                matrix_copy(temp,b);
                                power>>=1;
                              }
                  }
                 // long long fibno[2000009]={0};
 int main(){

           int i;
          // fibno[1]=1;
                 //  for(i=2;i<2000005;i++)         fibno[i]=(fibno[i-1]+fibno[i-2])%MOD;
            int t;
            scanf("%d",&t);
            while(t--){
                       long long n,ans1[2][2]={0},result;
                       scanint(n);
                      // if(n<=1000000) ans=(fibno[2*n-1]*fibno[2*n-2])%MOD;
                             fib(2*n,ans1);
                            //  printf("fn=%lld f2=%lld  %lld  %lld\n",ans1[0][0],ans1[0][1],ans1[1][0],ans1[1][1]);

                             result=(ans1[0][0]*(ans1[0][1]))%MOD;
                       printf("%lld\n",result);
                       }
            return 0;
            }
